serif.description: I worked with Serif as a contractor. Here my role was to develop solutions to the app we have built for their web3 community. Here I have created scripts for automations, endpoints to fetch data after the minting, galleries, landing pages and so on.

MAG-THEBAY.description: I created a site for their NGO using Next.js and SSG, Tailwind, MDX files and JSON files. I also created a CRUD system where they were able to register beneficiaries using Firebase, Firebase auth, Next.js, SSR and Tailwind.
